title: Short-Term Intensive Training for Technology-Enhanced Competency-Based Medical/Legal/Technical Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Core domain-specific knowledge and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Customized competency development programs utilizing real-time collaboration tools and digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three gaps in their professional expertise using a competency mapping tool
Learners can connect and explain five core competencies per field in an ontology-based learning system
Learners can design a metadata system that reflects skill-enhanced learning outcomes in an e-portfolio
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
